translations: n.喝彩声；（无线电通信中）字母B的代码；暴徒，（被人雇用的）杀手
n.（Bravo）（英、法、西、意、葡、塞）布拉沃（人名）

phrs.translation: 布拉沃, 亡命徒, 百菌清

sentences.sentence: No one knew it, however, least of all the Manager, who, cracking his whip, cried out, "Bravo, Pinocchio!"
sentences.translation: 可是谁也不知道，尤其是经理，他抽着鞭子叫道：“好极了，皮诺乔！”

sentences.sentence: Bravo company has suffered a staggering 28 casualties in two months, though luckily nobody has been killed.
sentences.translation: 喝彩连队两个月内出现28名伤员，所幸无人员死亡。

sentences.sentence: Howard Hawks hit paydirt with "Rio Bravo."
sentences.translation: 霍华德·霍克斯凭借影片《赤胆屠龙》一夜成名。
